title: Ideas
summary:
Ideas

Hello! This is my ideas page where I keep a brief record of some ideas I might want to explore in the near future. For ideas I have already begun exploring, please see my now page or my web log instead.

As of 03 Jan 2026, I have the following ideas in mind that I might want to explore in future:

  • Explore the problem of checking whether two self-complementary graphs are isomorphic.
  • Learn why \( s \)-arc transitive graph must have \( s \le 7. \)
